definition: to mix in fake material/to adulterate

sentences.english: However, Li found that Chen continued adulteration.
sentences.chinese: 但此后，李林发现陈平仍在继续掺假。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo recognize the method of adulterating and preparation process of Pangolin adulterated with sulphate magnesium.
sentences.chinese: 目的熟悉掺硫酸镁穿山甲的掺假方法与制备过程。

sentences.english: Is the pure nature honey slightly difficult to have to distinguish how to distinguish the fake honey out?
sentences.chinese: 纯天然蜂蜜与掺假蜂蜜很难区别吗？

sentences.english: Not only was milk commonly adulterated, it was often unclean.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶通常不止被掺假，也不卫生。

sentences.english: The adulterated honey can not be chosen, or can't become silks to choose either.
sentences.chinese: 掺假蜂蜜则不能被挑起，也不能挑成丝状。
大多数情况下掺假没被检出。

sentences.english: Even the frozen water-ices which should have consisted of nothing but water and a bit of flavouring were adulterated.
sentences.chinese: 即使是本应该只含有水和香料的刨冰也被掺假。

sentences.english: All through the Victorian era food was adulterated.
sentences.chinese: 在整个维多利亚时期，食品都是被掺假的。

sentences.english: First, food might be adulterated to make it more appealing.
sentences.chinese: 首先，食品被掺假后看起来更有吸引力。

sentences.english: Even medicines were adulterated and the “quantity of medical preparations thus injured is said to exceed belief.
sentences.chinese: 甚至药品也被掺假，“医药制剂的质量因此受损。”

sentences.english: The FDA also considers the seized Age Intervention Eyelash to be an adulterated cosmetic.
sentences.chinese: FDA还认为查获的睫毛增长液是一种掺假的化妆品。

sentences.english: Determination of adulterants in Chinese lacquer by pyrolysis gas chromatography is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了裂解气相色谱法鉴别中国生漆中的掺假物。

sentences.english: Just how widespread was the adulteration of food and drink?
sentences.chinese: 食品饮料掺假有多么盛行？

sentences.english: Why adulterated milk popular, do not adulterate the milk but nobody wanted?
sentences.chinese: 为什么掺假的牛奶走俏，不掺假的鲜奶反而没人要？

sentences.english: Why adulterated milk popular, do not adulterate the milk but nobody wanted?
sentences.chinese: 为什么掺假的牛奶走俏，不掺假的鲜奶反而没人要？

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prevent adulterated Pangolin scales to be used in clinic treatments.
sentences.chinese: 目的防止掺假炮山甲进入临床使用。

definition: to dilute/to debase (by mixing with fake material)
to counterfeit/to falsify/to cheat/to defraud/fraudulent/to behave affectedly
to counterfeit/to pass off a fake as genuine
to pass off fish eyes for pearls/to pass off fake products as genuine (idiom)
to skimp on the job and stint on materials (idiom)/jerry-building/sloppy work
to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)
